features: X-Comfort Zone .Ventilated expandable zone to accommodate a variety of feet widths and preventnumbness
Power Zone .Increased arch support and power transfer
Boa® TX system .New under lace to prevent dirt infiltration
Upper.Seamless PU leather and mesh providecomfort and breathability
Closure system.Boa® IP1-S two-way micro-adjustment for easy replacement with hook-and-loop strap
Outsole. Ergo Grip 2 nylon/fiberglass that providesexcellent traction and efficient mud cleaning
Cleats .SPD cleats fit all major MTB pedals
